desc:
Historical communal gathering defining Cypherpunk values, culture and actions within the Ethereum ecosystem, and beyond.

2500+ Attendees, 51 Speakers, same values.
The wind of change is blowing through Ethereum. The time has come to evolve from mass consumption to a culture of high values. Where decentralization, freedom, privacy, and politics are not empty words, but part of activism toward a more just world. 

9/9/2024
name: Ethereum Cypherpunk Congress @ Devcon 7 - Bangkok 2024

desc:
Vitalik Buterin [Ethereum] & Sebastian Bürgel  [GnosisDAO] disscussed Ethereum roadmap to cypherpunk values & privacy-enhancing technologies.

2000 visitors, 50 speakers, 1 Cypherpunk Congress @ Bangkok, 11.11.2024

Event: https://lu.ma/w3pn-meetup-devcon7
Ethereum Cypherpunk Congress #2 Nov 25: https://lu.ma/u2sw5kpv
name: Vitalik Buterin & Sebastian Bürgel Fireside Chat

desc:
The wind of change is blowing through Ethereum. The time has come to evolve from mass consumption to a culture of high values. Where decentralization, freedom, privacy, and politics are not empty words, but part of activism toward a more just world. 

We stand for Social-Political-Technological change on the road to Cypherpunk future for Ethereum.
All these directions are critical for shaping bigger decentralization narrative.

www.web3privacy.info
name: Ethereum Cypherpunk Transition narrated by Exiledsurfer
